user_input: Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Use the original file Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED and save file as Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Set all non-zero values to 999 for PCIPMIADVANCED infrastructure level

tasks.description: Modify the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED' by setting all non-zero values to 999 for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastructure level and save the file as 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Use the original file Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED and save file as Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED.', select the most appropriate file entity from the available list.
